name: Pet Fruit Sling Shooting
description:
One of the Most addictive cartoon pets slingshot 3D game on Appstore!!

How to play :
Tap the screen to jump on those random fruit slides.

Features
Graphics: 2D, fresh, impressive, colorful
8 characters
5 types of fruit
Sounds: funny
Characters shop, share and rate, leaderboard

Endless playing game!!

Enjoy Kids Pet Sling For Free !!
